data.name: Dwarf
data.description:
Ironforge Dwarf

Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+20% building HP regeneration
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Repair Aura
auras.description:
+4 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects mechanical units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Sharpshooter Aura
auras.description:
+20% building damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Runic Armor [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Defensive Stance
+1 level of Holy Radiance

Reduces spell damage to Guardian, Rifleman and Battlepriest by 25%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Gryphon Siege Engine [R]

Gryphon Siege Engine replaces Steam Tank
Siege Unit

+50 HP

(75 damage in 125 AoE)

Mithril Armor

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

bonuses.name: Dark Granite [C]
bonuses.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Dark Granite
spells.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

(can affect mechanical units)

bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

spells.description:

spells.description:

(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

towerUpgrades.name: Shredder Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and stun
Affects: Steam Tank, Mortar Trike and Bunker
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 15% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv2: 30% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv3: 45% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv4: 60% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Defensive Stance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: block for speed penalty
Affects: Guardian

Lv1: 15% chance, -10% attack rate
Lv2: 30% chance, -20% attack rate
Lv3: 45% chance, -30% attack rate
Lv4: 60% chance, -40% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Sharpshooting
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and ministun
Affects: Rifleman
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +5% attack rate, 25% for 0.5 sec
Lv2: +10% attack rate, 30% for 0.6 sec
Lv3: +15% attack rate, 35% for 0.7 sec
Lv4: +20% attack rate, 40% for 0.8 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Rifled Guns
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack range and damage
Affects: Rifleman, Steam Tank, Gyrocopter
and Mortar Trike

Lv1: +25 range, +4/6/8/12 damage
Lv2: +50 range, +8/12/16/24 damage
Lv3: +75 range, +12/18/24/36 damage
Lv4: +100 range, +16/24/32/48 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Missile Launchers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 2 missiles every 6 sec
Affects: Steam Tank and Gyrocopter

Lv1: 75 damage per missile
Lv2: 100 damage per missile
Lv3: 125 damage per missile
Lv4: 150 damage per missile

towerUpgrades.name: Composite Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: hit points and armor
Affects: All mechanical non-Hero units

Lv1: +25 HP, +2 armor
Lv2: +50 HP, +4 armor
Lv3: +75 HP, +6 armor
Lv4: +100 HP, +8 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Mortar Barrage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage ability
Affects: Mortar Trike

Lv1: 90 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 180 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 270 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 360 damage in 225 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Holy Radiance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: healing ability
Affects: Battlepriest

Lv1: +60 HP in 175 AoE
Lv2: +90 HP in 200 AoE
Lv3: +120 HP in 225 AoE
Lv4: +150 HP in 250 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Concussion Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: disruption in 175 AoE
Affects: Steam Tank
(affects non-Hero units only)
(slows move speed by 20%)

Lv1: 20% miss chance for 8 sec
Lv2: 40% miss chance for 7 sec
Lv3: 60% miss chance for 6 sec
Lv4: 80% miss chance for 5 sec

t1spell.name: Cannon Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Missile Barrage [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends missiles in all directions.
Each missile deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Alliance - Ironforge Dwarf
skills.description:
Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

skills.description:
15% for 2x damage and 1 sec stun.

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

skills.description:

heroes.name: King of Ironforge
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 15-30% slow
(250-400 area of effect)

Storm Bolt (Disable Spell)
200-500 damage, 3-6 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Rallying Cry (Support Spell)
2-8 armor bonus
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Second Wind (Self Spell)
heal 400-1000 HP over 15 sec

Strongest Brother (Support Aura)
+30% damage to other brothers

heroes.name: Mountain Champion
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 15-30% slow
(250-400 area of effect)

Battle Cry (Support Spell)
12-30% damage bonus
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Bash (Passive Skill)
20-25% to stun for 2 sec

Avatar of Stone (Self Spell)
+2000-3000 HP, +10 armor

Kindest Brother (Support Aura)
+8 HP/s to other brothers

heroes.name: Adventurer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Overload (Support Spell)
15-27% attack rate bonus
(affects mechanical units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Headshot (Passive Skill)
20-40% to do 2x damage
(affects organic units only)

Sharpshooter Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% ranged damage bonus

Repair (Healing Spell)
300-600 HP to 5 units
(affects mechanical units only)

Smartest Brother (Support Aura)
+8 armor to other brothers

heroes.name: Siege Fortress
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Mortar Barrage (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)

Heavy Missile (Disable Spell)
200-400 damage, 2 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)

Missile Launchers (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 missiles at units

Composite Armor (Passive Skill)
30-36% to block 30-60 damage
